sn30.7-16:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn30.7-16:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana andajanam supannanam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti?
sn30.7-16:1.4: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kayena dvayakari hoti, vacaya dvayakari, manasa dvayakari.
sn30.7-16:1.8: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana andajanam supannanam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn30.7-16:1.19: So kayassa bheda param marana andajanam supannanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
sn30.7-16:1.20: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana andajanam supannanam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti.
